name: apttusApprove
description: Simple message broker to enable Slack to Apttus Approvals using Slash Commands

CLIENT_ID.description: Client Id of your Salesforce Connected App

CLIENT_SECRET.description: Secret of your Salesforce Connected App

USER_NAME.description: Salesforce username for your integration user

PASSWORD.description: Salesforce password for your integration user

APPROVAL_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the case slash command

CASE_TOKEN.description: Slack token for the case slash command
